text:
This is the story of 
a very sick girl

and a set of events seen 
two different ways.

Justina, just a very 
special child.
I love you!
I love you too!
She was thriving.

About 10 years of age, 
things changed.
She was in so much pain.

The hospital was alleging 
the Pelletier family

was overmedicalizing 
their daughter.

Overmedicalizing is getting 
more medications or
procedures than they need.

Doctors are saying 
Justina's parents

aren't making safe 
decisions for her.
It just made no sense.
The juvenile court decided

to terminate the 
parents' custody.

Linda and I never abused 
any of our children.
Was Justina being abused?
I don't understand it.
Then something happens that changes everything.

This very ominous video 
comes out from Anonymous.

And that's when all 
hell broke loose.
